level.title: Rainbows
level.message: The rainbow is beautiful because many different colors work together. Celebrate diversity!

level.title: School of Fish
level.message: Stay in school!

level.title: Rock Guitar
level.message: You are my hero.

level.title: Bread
level.message: That was toasty!

level.title: Snowman
level.message: That was frosty!

level.title: Abstract 1
level.message: Break the mold, be yourself!

level.title: Land of Giants 1
level.message: Eat healthy food to grow up big and strong!

level.title: Eight!
level.message: That was some fancy work to smash that crazy eight!

level.title: Land of Giants 2: Meet the Indestructible Brick
level.message: Wear a helmet and pads when you bike and skateboard because no matter how big and strong you are, you're not indestructible.

level.title: Triple Threat
level.message: You've got it all: aim, skill, and patience! A real triple threat!

level.title: The Turtle
level.message: Slow and steady wins the race. You're doing great!

level.title: Play Safe, Play Hard
level.message: Slam dunk!

level.title: Spider
level.message: Don't get caught in a web of trouble: avoid drugs and alcohol!

level.title: The Plane
level.message: You're flying now!

level.title: Abstract 2
level.message: Fantastic job!

level.title: Patriot
level.message: Respect your country and your community! Try community service!

level.title: Let's Go Bowling
level.message: NEVER give out personal information when you're online.

level.title: diamonds
level.message: It looks like we found a diamond in the rough!

level.title: The Gang's All Here
level.message: Avoid gangs. Stick with your friends and trusted adults.

level.title: Soccer
level.message: GOAL! Playing soccer with friends is a great way to spend time after school.

level.title: The Soft Spot
level.message: Remember McGruff's advice so you're not soft on safety.

level.title: Peckish Peckish Pumpkins Tribute (Smash the Candles)
level.message: Check out the other fun games at McGruff.org!

level.title: Racing
level.message: You're unstoppable! Always wear a helmet and pads when you ride on bikes, skateboards, and ATVs.

level.title: The Park
level.message: What a pro! I bet you're great at the Clean the Park game, too!

level.title: Tooth Decay
level.message: You must be smiling after playing that well. Keep that smile healthy by visiting your dentist regularly.

level.title: Swirl
level.message: Breaking the law starts a downward spiral. Stay away from gangs and keep yourself safe!

level.title: Peace
level.message: Remember, solving problems with violence is not the answer! Keep the peace and talk it out.

level.title: Love
level.message: Remember, friendship beats bullies. Stick with your friends and avoid trouble.

level.title: Happiness
level.message: Smiling is contagious, so share yours with someone.

level.title: Penalty Kick
level.message: You handled that well!

level.title: Autumn
level.message: That was tree-mendous!

level.title: Under the Stairs
level.message: Rise to the occasion.

level.title: Hoop Dreams
level.message: Shoot for the stars!

level.title: Mjolnir
level.message: Prevention is powerful! Take A Bite Out Of Crime!

level.title: Arpeggio
level.message: Being Safe Sounds Good To Me!

level.title: Steel-Toed Boot
level.message: Stay safe so you grow up tough and strong.

level.title: Scotty
level.message: Be loyal to your friends and family!

level.title: Thread the Needle
level.message: Careful work there.

level.title: Thunder Lizard
level.message: Great job!

level.title: The Piano
level.message: Playing an instrument is a great hobby!

level.title: Butterfly
level.message: Never judge a book by its cover. Even a beautiful butterfly starts life as a little caterpillar.

level.title: Space Castle
level.message: Work hard in school and the sky is the limit.

level.title: Hoop Nightmares
level.message: Playing basketball with friends is a great way to spend an afternoon.

level.title: Square Dance
level.message: Every dance, like every journey, begins with a single step. Take the first step!

level.title: Perfect Aim
level.message: Practice makes perfect and you sure have practiced!

level.title: Trampoline
level.message: Jump for joy!

level.title: Limbo
level.message: Way to raise the bar!

level.title: The Gauntlet
level.message: You ran the gauntlet with grace and decorum!
